opinion.case_name: Invention Submission Corp. v. Dudas, as Undersecretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director, Patent and Trademark Office, Department of Commerce

opinion:
543 U.S. 955

INVENTION SUBMISSION CORP.
v.
DUDAS, AS UNDERSECRETARY OF COMMERCE FOR INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY AND DIRECTOR, PATENT AND TRADEMARK OFFICE, DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE.

No. 04-40.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 1, 2004.

1

C. A. 4th Cir. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 357 F. 3d 452.
